reviews.name: Brother GX-6750 Portable Electronic Typewriter
reviews.reviewText: I am turning 62 in 2 months and recently retired... I got this typewriter to help me make out my Social Security forms, and my insurance forms, and all kinds of forms that go along with retirement, and there are a lot of them. My writing has deteriorated from not so good to terrible... I needed help in a big way... This typewriter was the answer... A true bargain and it works like a Pro... I highly recommend it...
reviews.title: A Real Time Saver

reviews.name: Brother GX-6750 Portable Electronic Typewriter
reviews.reviewText: For those still looking for a traditional typewriter, this item is a good choice.
reviews.title: Good Product

reviews.name: Brother GX-6750 Portable Electronic Typewriter
reviews.reviewText: Great buy! It is very light weight, easy to move around the office for use by multiple users. Very easy to use.
reviews.title: Brother typewriter

reviews.name: Brother GX-6750 Portable Electronic Typewriter
reviews.reviewText: The auto correct features are awesome on this typewriter.
reviews.title: great typewriter for home use!

reviews.name: Brother GX-6750 Portable Electronic Typewriter
reviews.reviewText: We've had this for a couple of weeks and seems to be a good typewriter. We don't use it alot, just for individual labels and an occasional envelope. The other Brother we had quit after 12+ years and we replaced it with this Brother. Very lightweight and being it's an almost exact replica of the old one, is easy to figure out how to use (with the Code keys, for example). Keys feel very "loose" and wiggle easily, so I almost expected them to fall off! (Also why I gave it only 4 stars) For the value and what we use it for though, it's perfect.
reviews.title: Good for the job!
